titles.title: A bill to establish the Blennerhassett National Historical Park in the State of West Virginia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, OMB.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 10/1/1987--Introduced. Establishes the Blennerhassett National Historical Park in West Virginia. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to accept donations, acquire lands, and enter into cooperative agreements with West Virginia. Establishes the Blennerhassett National Historical Park Advisory Commission to consult with the Secretary on the management of the Park. Authorizes appropriations.
